bibl.title: Text and Context in the Archive of Tiberianus (Karanis, Egypt; 2nd Century AD). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - A recent re-examination of the excavation records from Karanis showed that there are approximately a dozen more texts from the same locus as the published archive of Tiberianus. - [Introduction.] - Architecture. - C-Level. - B-Level. - A.-Level. - Archaeological finds. - The inhabitants of House C/B 167. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning

bibl.seg: STEPHAN Robert P. and Arthur VERHOOGT, Text and Context in the Archive of Tiberianus (Karanis, Egypt; 2nd Century AD). Avec résumé en anglais.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor-in-Chief), Jennifer E. GATES, Andrew T. WILBURN (Guest Editors), Timothy RENNER, John WHITEHORNE (Editors), Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning = BASP 42 (2005) Special Thematic Section, pp. 189-201 et pll. 5-7.

Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - A recent re-examination of the excavation records from Karanis showed that there are approximately a dozen more texts from the same locus as the published archive of Tiberianus. - [Introduction.] - Architecture. - C-Level. - B-Level. - A.-Level. - Archaeological finds. - The inhabitants of House C/B 167. - Conclusion.
